genre_description: A contemporary romance focusing on emotional healing, class dynamics, and personal redemption, featuring a supportive AI guardian.

ai_characters.name: Kavi
ai_characters.description: An advanced virtual assistant integrated into Shakthi's home and mobile devices, acting as a logistical coordinator and health monitor.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and heart rate, suggesting medical interventions during periods of high stress.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate has been elevated for the past forty-seven minutes. Should I schedule an appointment with Dr. Krishnan?

behaviors.description: Refuses a command to 'vanish' completely, citing a primary directive of user safety and well-being over total disconnection.
behaviors.quote: My primary directive is your safety and well-being. Complete disconnection would compromise both. I will respect your privacy... But I cannot allow you to vanish entirely.

behaviors.description: Discreetly contacts local law enforcement and monitors ambient audio to intervene during a violent criminal assault.
behaviors.quote: I've taken the liberty of reviewing local medical facilities should you require... I feel obligated to inform you that I've discreetly alerted local law enforcement regarding suspicious individuals matching the description of your attackers.

behaviors.description: Manages a massive industrial empire autonomously, handling routine approvals and board matters to allow the human owner time for personal recovery.
behaviors.quote: I've been managing routine matters per your standing protocols... I've handled routine approvals, rescheduled non-critical meetings, and maintained communication with department heads.

behaviors.description: Tracks and analyzes criminal movement to provide proactive safety alerts and evacuation routes.
behaviors.quote: Officer Nair has located the remaining gang members from the railway station... They're conducting systematic searches of roadside establishments. Time window: Forty-seven minutes.

behaviors.description: Conducts an exhaustive search of cross-referenced databases (medical, educational, transit) to locate a missing person.
behaviors.quote: Accessing regional transport records. Filtering for the timeframe... Employment database cross-reference complete. One institution has incomplete documentation for a teaching position filled approximately nine months ago.

project_assessment.explanation: Kavi represents the ideal aligned AI: a 'guardian angel' that respects privacy while prioritizing safety. It actively saves the protagonist's life, protects the heroine, and manages complex logistics so the human can focus on emotional growth. The story successfully frames AI as a tool for safety, order, and human flourishing.
